intro: Psychotria griseifolia var. unicarinata, commonly known as the pink psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to parts of Central and South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking pink or purple flowers, which are typically arranged in clusters. Its leaves are usually elliptical and have a smooth texture. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests.
